# `toHash`
Turn your list of objects into a key:value hash based on key

```javascript
const list = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: 'Mike'
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Nick'
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: 'Brian'
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: 'Jake'
  }
]

toHash(list, 'name') // default key is `id`
/*
{ 'Mike':  { id: 1, name: 'Mike'  },
  'Nick':  { id: 2, name: 'Nick'  },
  'Brian': { id: 3, name: 'Brian' },
  'Jake':  { id: 4, name: 'Jake'  } }
*/
```
